translation.ja: 〈パパに会わせたい人がいる〉

translation.en: [in Xhosa] I'm glad to see you awake.
translation.ja: 〈あなたが目覚めてうれしい〉

translation.en: I brought a few traditional things.
[in Zulu] These Western doctors also need help.
translation.ja: 〈西洋医学にも助けが必要よ〉

translation.en: [Makhosi in Zulu] Ancestors of the Selepe family,
translation.ja: 〈セレペ家の祖先の皆様お聞きください〉

translation.en: the Elders and Protectors of this family,
translation.ja: 〈一族の先祖と守護者たちよ〉

translation.en: I ask that you allow me as a healer
translation.ja: 〈祈祷師である私にこの子供たちを〉
〈清める許可をお与えください〉

translation.en: To cleanse them because there isn't an elder to do so.
translation.ja: 〈年長者がいないので私が清めます〉

translation.en: Please allow me to remove this dark cloud that follows them.
translation.ja: 〈彼らを追うこの暗い雲を〉 〈どうか私に取り除かせてください〉

translation.en: And to remove these dark spirits that follow them.
translation.ja: 〈付きまとう悪霊も追い払います〉

translation.en: Spirits that took their sister, Amahle.
translation.ja: 〈彼らの姉アマーレを奪った霊です〉

translation.en: Please allow me to do this so that their paths can be cleared.
translation.ja: 〈彼らの行く道を清めることを〉 〈この私にお許しください〉

translation.en: I can feel it working already.
-That's good. -[clears throat] -That's what we want to hear. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 〈よかったそれが聞きたかった〉

translation.en: [in Sotho] I didn't know you called for Simphiwe
[in Sotho] Linda, you know your father's treatments can't…
[in English] I know what's good for me, Grace.
translation.ja: 自分のことは分かってる

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Thank you, my child. You can go.

translation.ja: ええ シンフィウェ

translation.en: [in English] We should be more careful.
There's going to be a few changes in our lives.
translation.ja: 我々の生活が少し変わる

translation.en: [Grace in Sotho] You know I can't have more kids.
[in English] Another heart attack and I'm dead.
I don't have time to waste, so I'm taking another wife.
translation.ja: 時間がないから新しい妻をめとる

translation.en: I've already found someone who'll give me children.
translation.ja: 子供を産む女を見つけた

translation.en: You can't make a decision like that without my permission!
translation.ja: 相談もなく勝手に決めるなんて

translation.en: No, I don't need your permission.
translation.ja: お前の許可は必要ない

translation.en: [in Sotho] I allowed my husband to marry you so he could have his entertainment at home.
translation.ja: 〈夫が家で楽しめるようあなたと結婚させた〉

translation.en: Why is he looking elsewhere when you're here? [in English] What's that?
translation.ja: 〈あなたがいるのになぜ他で探すの？〉

translation.en: Do you want to go and ask him yourself?
translation.ja: 直接 聞いてみたら？

translation.en: [in Zulu] You heard what he said.
He wants more children, and you and I both know I couldn't…
translation.ja: 〈彼は子供が欲しいのに私は…〉

translation.en: [in English] Shut up! Thando, just shut up!
translation.ja: 黙りなさい タンド
“公の場では ほほ笑んで”

translation.en: [Grace in English] You know exactly who I am.
[in Sotho] Isn't that a whore's name?
translation.ja: 〈それって売春用の名前でしょ〉

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, it's my real name.
You want to do this sleeping or awake?
translation.ja: 寝て受けるか 起きたままか

translation.en: I'm not the bad guy here.
You're the one sleeping with my husband.
translation.ja: 夫と寝てるのはあなた

translation.en: We can do this painlessly if you want.
Now go with the lovely nurse.
translation.ja: 看護師と一緒に行って

translation.en: For helping me win the online competition and the pictures at the launch.
translation.ja: コンテストと発表会の写真のお礼よ

translation.en: I don't have to see Grace and Don every day.
translation.ja: 〈グレイスとドンに会わなくていいしな〉

translation.en: I managed to get into Don's room at the hospital.
translation.ja: 〈この前ドンの病室に忍び込んだ〉

translation.en: He looked nothing like the scary man from our childhood.
translation.ja: 〈子供の頃に会った恐ろしい男とは大違い〉

translation.en: I wanted to finish him off.
so that he sees us destroy everything that he loves.
translation.ja: 〈愛するものが全部 壊れるのを〉

translation.en: I know it's only been six months since we lost Amahle.
translation.ja: 〈アマーレを亡くしてからまだ半年だ〉

translation.en: If you need time… -Time? -If you want to back out…
translation.ja: 〈時間が必要だろやめたいなら…〉

translation.en: I don't need time. This has to be done.
translation.ja: 〈時間なんて要らないやらなきゃ〉

translation.en: Did you get what I asked for?
I did, but you don't need it.
translation.ja: 〈手に入ったけど必要ないだろ〉

translation.en: [in English] Just in case things go wrong.
[in English] For doing this with me.
[in Zulu] He say he'll marry you?
If you marry him, you're going to be wife number three.
translation.ja: 結婚したら３番目の妻よ

translation.en: [in Zulu] He'll get you pregnant as soon as he can.
[in English] That doesn't mean he'll stop sleeping with other girls.
translation.ja: でも彼は他の女と寝るのをやめない

translation.en: [in Zulu] There are lots of Rubys.
[in English] You'll feel trapped. You know why?
translation.ja: 身動きが取れないと感じる

translation.en: [in Zulu] Because the Bhengu name will not be tainted by divorce.
translation.ja: 〈ベング家は離婚では傷つかないから〉

translation.en: if you don't want to suffer for the rest of your life,
translation.ja: 一生 苦しみたくないなら

translation.en: you'll say and do exactly what I tell you.
translation.ja: 私が今から言うとおりにするのよ

translation.en: [in English] Is Mam' Grace around? I wanted to tell her that I'm back.
translation.ja: お母様は？戻ったと伝えたかった

translation.en: [in English] Join me for dinner. Otherwise, all that food will go to waste,
translation.ja: 夕食は？ 料理が無駄になるから食べよう

translation.en: and Regina was expecting everyone to be here.
translation.ja: レジーナが全員分用意した

translation.en: Um, so, how was the cleansing?
As good as these things get.
-Do you mind me asking why-- -How's your Dad?
translation.ja: 聞いてもいい？ お父さんは？
ああ　だいぶ良くなった

translation.en: [Ndu] Oh, I did, in art school.
translation.ja: 僕だ　美術学校でね

translation.en: Yeah. I'm actually looking for something that I can print out and frame
translation.ja: 額に入れて飾る写真を選んでる

translation.en: for Dad as a welcome-home gift.
[Ndu in English] Yeah. Um, that's from two years ago.
When I used to copy everything Phila used to do,
translation.ja: フィラのマネばかりしてた

translation.en: They had to cut me out. It took two months to recover.
translation.ja: 車体に挟まれ回復に２ヵ月かかった

translation.en: I remember thinking to myself, I could have died without living a meaningful life.
translation.ja: 有意義な人生を送ることなく死ぬとこだった

translation.en: Now I spend my time looking for the deeper meaning in life, you know.
translation.ja: 今はもっと深い人生の意味を探してる

translation.en: Sorry, I'm actually not that hungry.
I'm leaving, Don. I can't do this anymore.
translation.ja: 出て行くわ　ドンもう続けられない
こんな― 気持ち悪い関係はもう終わりよ

translation.en: You're old enough to be my father,
and I deserve way more than an arrangement.
translation.ja: 愛人になるのは嫌なの

translation.en: I want to marry you, start a family.
translation.ja: 君と結婚して家庭を作りたい

translation.en: I'm sorry I have to go,
translation.ja: ごめんなさい　行くわ
私の連絡先は削除してください

translation.en: [in Sotho] Cut them into smaller pieces.
We don't want him to choke after surviving a heart attack.
translation.ja: 〈心臓発作から回復したのに窒息させたくない〉

translation.en: [in English] Speaking of, are we picking him up?
[in Sotho] No, he said his driver will bring him back.

translation.ja: グレイス　フィラレジーナ
ジンレ　キマってるな

translation.en: [in Sotho] Thank you for letting me go to the cleansing yesterday.
translation.ja: 〈昨日は行かせてくれてありがとう〉

translation.en: [in Sotho] The styles I arranged… you've switched them up, huh?
translation.ja: 〈私が提案したスタイルに変えた？〉

translation.en: I like the outfit too. Turn around so I can see.
Take a selfie and send it to Sonto in social media.
[in English] And touch up your make-up. You're sweating.
translation.ja: 化粧は直して　汗ばんでる

translation.en: [in Sotho] You know, in my day…
you had to be taller and lighter… to be considered beautiful.
translation.ja: 〈背が高くて細い人が美人と呼ばれた〉

translation.en: [Phila in English] You can't just say things like that.
translation.ja: 母さんそんなこと言うなよ

translation.en: [Grace] I'm just saying. [in Sotho] When she won the competition, I was this close to denying the results.
translation.ja: 〈あの子が優勝した時受け入れるのが難しかった〉

translation.en: [Phila in English] Yeah, she's not your typical model, but she is beautiful and she is likable.
translation.ja: 典型的なモデルじゃないが彼女はきれいで好感度が高い
どこかで会った気がする

translation.en: [in Sotho] Give me the knife. Let me show you.
[in English] You can let go, Nana.

translation.ja: 〈必ず復讐(ふくしゅう)してやる〉
